channel.title: PI how to make new players master when they first login?
channel.description: Hi, i'm having problems making it so your maxed out when you first login. Please help?

item.title: PI how to make new players master when they first login?
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

In the starter method, simply add all of the xp.

Read full topic

item.title: PI how to make new players master when they first login?
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:2, topic:476821”]How u mean?
Like if they login they immediately are max cb?
If i were you i should make it something cool like an Maxed xp lamp which gives 13m exp in every skill and does a cool animation.
And then you can add a Pure lamp as well.
So players can still decide IF they want to be maxed.[/quote]

I like your idea, I’m gonna have to find a snippet or tut on that. haha and thanks to the second post.

Read full topic
item.source: PI how to make new players master when they first login?

item.title: PI how to make new players master when they first login?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Check the player loading when a new character is made, change the stats to 99.
